"The Ursadyne Pulse, a light, fast emergancy medical service vessel. It is equipped with a functional medbay and an FLT drive, allowing it to quickly respond to sector medical needs."
# SHIP FEATURES
## 1. Bridge
### 1.1. Control Systems
- Unlock the Shuttle computer using your ID card. - The Shuttle computers network ports can be used to control a number of ship systems. - 1: Toggle Searchlight - 2: Toggle Ship Lighting - 3: Toggle Cockpit Shutters - 4: Toggle Blast Doors - 5: Lock Cokcpit Door - 6: Toggle Thrusters - Use the Station Records computer to open up slots for the other crew members. - The Holopad can be used to directly contact other ships or stations. - The Crew Monitoring computer can be used to monitor the health of the sector inhabitants.
### 1.2. Safety Systems
- Check that the EVA locker is filled with a hardsuit, air tank, and mini-jetpack. - The shuttle console can be used to toggle the shutters. - The Gunnery Console can be used to control the M220 EMP turrets.
## 2. Medical Service
### 2.1. Medbay
- The medbay is equipped with a Stasis Bed, Medical Bed, and Operating Table. - A sink is included.
### 2.2 Medical Supplies
- The Doctors locker contains a full set of medical equipment - The Medical Locker contains basic topical meds - The Surgery Duffel Bag contains a full set of surgical tools. - The Roller Bed can be used to transport patients.
## 3. Engineering
### 3.1. Power System
- Check that the S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the SMES unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the Fuel Locker has spare fuel. - While the Thrusters are off, the Generator can be reduced to 50% power to save fuel.
### 3.2. Atmospherics
- Ensure that a air canister is wrenched to the connector port. - Set the Ships Air Alarms to Filtering (Wide)
### 3.3 Other Systems
- Check that the gyroscope is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled. - The wall charger can be used to recharge power cells.
